basics.name: Shanel Crawford

basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

education.area: Infomration and Computer Science, and Theatre (expected Spring, 2021)

work.company: James Campbell High School- Department of Education
work.summary: Tutor for subjects such as Math and Science
highlights: Interacted and Communicated with students, staff, and faculty to assist teachers through transporting important files and materials.

Assisted students in the learning process to aid in course work ranging from English, Geometry, Algebra II, and Biology; both through the Advancement Via Individual Determination (AVID) college preparatory Program and afterschool tutoring.

volunteer.summary: Volunteer to tutor young children, and help with club activities.
highlights: Help with various activity set ups, reading children books to young children, and tutored young students with Math.
